org.dancres.blitz.jini.lockmgr
Class JiniConfig

java.lang.Object
  org.dancres.blitz.jini.lockmgr.JiniConfig
public class JiniConfig
extends java.lang.Object

Holds configuration for JINI related aspects of the Replica Group.

public JiniConfig(java.lang.String[] aGroups,

JiniConfig

public JiniConfig(java.lang.String[] aGroups,
                  net.jini.core.discovery.LookupLocator[] aLocators,
                  net.jini.core.entry.Entry[] anAttrs,
                  net.jini.export.Exporter anExporter,
                  long aTimeout,
                  java.lang.String aMcastAddr,
                  int aMcastPort,
                  int aTTL,
                  java.lang.String aLockGroup)
Parameters:
aGroups - determines the JINI groups in which the node will advertise it's Replicant proxy.
aLocators - determines specific lookup services in which the node will advertise it's Replicant proxy.
anAttrs - the Entry attributes to use for registration
anExporter - determines the form of transport used by the Replicant proxy. Limited configuration options only as of this moment because ServerProxyTrust is not implemented.
aTimeout - is the time in which a network operation between nodes should complete.
aMcastAddr - is the multicast address to use for comms
aMcastPort - is the multicast port to use for comms
aTTL - is the ttl which should be placed on multicast packets
aLockGroup - can be used to create separate groups of co-operating LockMgrs. Ensure you label the registered proxy's in some way such as adding an Entry attribute or changing the LUS group so that you can differentiate.
